Description.Text:
Position One of the oldest hotels in Sestri Levante directly on the promenade and situated in an idyllic location just 50 meters from the sea.
Restaurant Treatment: BB or HB - American buffet breakfast. During the summer season is an excellent buffet breakfast and dinner by candlelight will take place outdoors in the garden.
Outside
Lobby
More Informations Facilities: rooftop sun terrace with fresh water swimming pool (12x6) with a view overview with free sun beds in operation (weather permitting) from 15/05 to 30/09, beach (late May to late September) with local payment. For a fee: bicycles and scooters, golf and tennis 1 km to 18 km.
